summary: The video provides a tour of a dog-friendly room at Estelle Manor, showcasing various amenities and facilities. The narrator highlights the spacious stables room, a foyer with dog supplies like poo bags and treats, and a birthday gift of macarons. The mini-bar area includes wine, teas, sugar, coffee pods, and snacks, all of which incur additional charges. The bathroom contains a vanity, shower, and various kits such as skincare, intimacy, dental, shaving, and sanitary items. The bedroom features a TV and wardrobe space. The room costs £650 per night for the standard stable room and £750 per night for the upgraded large stable room. The narrator notes the high cost and wonders about the pricing for rooms without a dog.
keywords: Estelle Manor, dog-friendly room, stables room, mini-bar, snacks, birthday macarons, skincare, intimacy kit, condoms, shaving kit, sanitary kit, bedroom, TV, wardrobe, £650, £750, high cost, dog amenities
